trans-unit.source: Represents a property identifier and the property value for a locally set dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示屬性的識別項和屬性值的本機設定相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are returned when getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A><xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>.</xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>屬性</xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A>的值時，會傳回此類別的執行個體

trans-unit.source: All LocalValueEntry properties are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 所有 LocalValueEntry 屬性都是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別具有公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: In order to obtain instances of this class you must call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A>, and then get the value of <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A> from the returned <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得您必須先呼叫這個類別的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A>，然後取得的值<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A>從傳回<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>.</xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator> </xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref>執行個體會相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"> </xref>要與目前比較<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.op_Equality*> implementation compares the values of the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property*>, and potentially compares the values of <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value*>. The <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property*> component of a <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref> is a value type, so will always be a bitwise comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這<> *> 實作比較的值<> *>，可能會比較的值和<> *>。<> </> *> 元件<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref>是實值類型，因此一律為位元比較。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value*> component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value*>元件，此實作會使用位元比較如果它是實值類型。</xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value*>

trans-unit.source: For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it just uses the == operator on the two values internally.
trans-unit.target: 針對在本機上設定屬性有參考類型的行為會委託給該類型的等號比較決策機制，因為它只會使用內部 = = 運算子，在兩個值。

trans-unit.source: By default, this would be a reference equality of the values and thus the equality of the entire <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref> would become a reference equality.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這會是參考的值是否相等，因此將整個相等<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref>就會變成參考相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個雜湊程式碼<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的 32 位元整數值。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref> instances to determine whether they are the same.
trans-unit.target: 比較指定<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref>執行個體，判斷它們是否相同。

trans-unit.source: This Equality implementation compares the values of the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>, and potentially compares the values of <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此實作中相等比較的值<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>，並可能會比較值的<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A> component of a <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> is always a value type, so this comparison will always be a bitwise value comparison.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>元件<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>永遠是實值類型，因此這項比較一律為位元的值比較。</xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> </xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A> component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A>元件，此實作會使用位元比較如果它是實值類型。</xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it uses the `==` operator on the two values internally.
trans-unit.target: 針對在本機上設定屬性有參考類型的行為會委託給該類型的等號比較決策機制，因為它使用`==`運算子對這兩個內部值。

trans-unit.source: By default, this is a reference equality of the values.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這是參考的值相等。

trans-unit.source: The first instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: if the obj1 is equal to the obj2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if the obj1 is equal to the obj2; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator"></xref> instances to determine whether they are different.
trans-unit.target: 比較指定<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator"></xref>執行個體，判斷它們是否不同。

trans-unit.source: The first instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This implementation compares the values of the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property*> and <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value*> components of a <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作比較的值<> *> 和<> *> 元件<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property*> component of a <xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref> is always a value type, so this comparison will always be a bitwise comparison. For the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value*> component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 元件<xref href="System.Windows.LocalValueEntry"></xref>永遠是實值類型，因此這項比較一律為位元比較。如<> *> 元件，此實作會使用位元比較如果它是實值類型。

trans-unit.source: For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it uses the <xref uid="langword_csharp_==" name="==" href=""></xref> operator on the two values internally.
trans-unit.target: 針對在本機上設定屬性有參考類型的行為會委託給該類型的等號比較決策機制，因為它使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_==" name="==" href=""></xref>運算子對這兩個內部值。

trans-unit.source: By default, this is a reference equality of the values.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這是參考的值相等。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the locally set dependency property that is represented by this entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得本機設定的識別項由這個項目之相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to query the identifier of the locally set dependency property and to obtain its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性用於查詢的識別項的本機設定相依性屬性，並取得它的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: This obtained metadata may include the initial default value of the property and whether the property supports property value inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 取得中繼資料可能包含屬性的屬性是否支援屬性值繼承的初始預設值。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the locally set dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 本機設定的識別項相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the locally set dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 取得值的本機設定相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine a more specific type for this value, check the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A> for the current <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> and get its <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.PropertyType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷此值更特定的類型，檢查<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>目前<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>並取得其<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.PropertyType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.PropertyType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> </xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the locally set dependency property as an object.
trans-unit.target: 本機設定的值當做物件的相依性屬性。
